column4: Hello, I have a flat TFT screen wich uses 60Hz in windows. I guess this 60Hz is the optimal rate, but ubuntu uses 74Hz and the display is a bit fuzzy. How can I change it to 60Hz ??
I don't believe you measure LCD refresh rates in that way.
hm.. ok. Well I know its not the same as CRT rate.. tried to find some docs on google about this but found none :/
